Directions: In a large skillet, cook turkey and onion in oil until turkey is no longer pink, about 6 minutes; drain. Combine the broth, soup, vegetables and lemon-pepper. Add to the skillet; bring to a boil. Stir in noodles. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 10 minutes or until noodles and vegetables are tender.
Ingredients: 1 pound turkey breast tenderloins, cut into 1/4 inch slices
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of celery soup, undiluted
